The Working Hour: An Introduction to Tears for Fears is a compilation album by the English pop rock band Tears for Fears. Released by Mercury Records on 26 March 2001.
Reception
| rev2 = The Encyclopedia of Popular Music
| rev2score =
}}
James Christopher Monger of AllMusic states that it collects "15 tracks from the mercurial English pop group, culled from all of their albums up to 1993's Elemental", going on to state that it "keeps the collection relegated to the shadows behind far better overviews like Shout: The Very Best of Tears for Fears and 2006's Gold."
